alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 1:35PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent and ongoing rains in the Ohio River basin are expected to cause rises in the river which will last a week or more. Some locations will go into flood. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 44.1 feet Sunday, January 9th. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
